Class ApplicationController

java.lang.Object
ApplicationController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ApplicationServiceInterface
public class ApplicationController extends Object implements ApplicationServiceInterface
Implementation of application management services.

This class implements the ApplicationServiceInterface, providing application lifecycle management with loose coupling.

Version:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • accept

      public boolean accept(Student student, Application app) throws ApplicationException
      Description copied from interface: ApplicationServiceInterface
      Student accepts an approved application (confirms placement).

      This reserves a slot on the internship and auto-withdraws all other active applications from the same student.

      Specified by:
      accept in interface ApplicationServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      student - the student accepting the placement
      app - the application to accept
      Returns:
      true if acceptance successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      ApplicationException - if validation fails or no slots available

    • reject

      public boolean reject(Student student, Application app)
      Description copied from interface: ApplicationServiceInterface
      Student rejects an application (withdraws before confirmation).
      Specified by:
      reject in interface ApplicationServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      student - the student rejecting
      app - the application to reject
      Returns:
      true if rejection successful, false otherwise

    • review

      public void review(InternshipOpportunity internshipOpportunity, Application app, ApplicationStatus decision)
      Description copied from interface: ApplicationServiceInterface
      Company Representative reviews an application.
      Specified by:
      review in interface ApplicationServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      internshipOpportunity - the internship being applied to
      app - the application to review
      decision - the decision (ACCEPTED or REJECTED)

    • requestForWithdrawal

      public void requestForWithdrawal(Application app)
      Description copied from interface: ApplicationServiceInterface
      Student requests withdrawal of an application.

      Creates a WithdrawalRequest that requires staff approval.

      Specified by:
      requestForWithdrawal in interface ApplicationServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      app - the application to withdraw

    • decideWithdrawal

      public void decideWithdrawal(CareerCenterStaff staff, Application app, WithdrawalStatus decision)
      Description copied from interface: ApplicationServiceInterface
      Career Center Staff approves or rejects a withdrawal request.
      Specified by:
      decideWithdrawal in interface ApplicationServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      staff - the staff member making the decision
      app - the application with withdrawal request
      decision - the decision (APPROVED or REJECTED)
